# Pull Request

## Task Completion Checklist

- [ ] 本 PR **僅對應一個已指派的 Issue**  
      This PR corresponds to **one and only one assigned Issue**.

- [ ] 所有需求已依 Issue 描述完成  
      All requirements described in the Issue have been fully implemented.

- [ ] 程式碼符合 issue 指定的參考風格與結構  
      The code follows the coding style and structure specified in the Issue.

- [ ] 已在本地通過 issue 指定的測試  
      All tests specified in the Issue have passed in the local environment.



---

## Additional Notes (Optional)

是否有任何你認為交付內容中需要特別注意的地方：  
Please describe anything that reviewers should pay special attention to:

-

## Rights and License Declaration (Required)

提交此 Pull Request 即表示你同意：  
By submitting this Pull Request, you agree that:

- 本次提交內容為 **專案委託開發成果**  
  All submitted content is considered **work made for hire**.

- 相關著作財產權與使用權 **全數歸專案擁有者所有**  
  All related intellectual property rights and usage rights are fully assigned to the project owner.

---

感謝你的交付，審查將依照 Issue 進行  
Thank you for your delivery. The review will be conducted based on the corresponding Issue.
